meanings.definition: The condition of having a single chromosome instead of the usual pair.
meanings.sent1: Monosomy can lead to genetic disorders.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the patient with monosomy after genetic testing.
meanings.sent3: The lonely chromosome felt like the odd one out in the cell party.
meanings.sent4: In a world of pairs, monosomy stood alone like a lone wolf.
meanings.sent5: The concept of monosomy is like having a solo performer on stage, captivating yet solitary.
